data.title: Cher News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Cher
data.text:
The Extravagant Way Cher and Boyfriend Alexander Edwards Celebrated Her 78th Birthday

Cher and boyfriend Alexander "A.E." Edwards had an incredible time celebrating the singer's 78th birthday May 20, exclusively telling E! News they "went to a fabulous place."

Cher Opens Up About the Designer of Her Most Iconic Fashion Moments

Cher, Pink and Carol Burnett open up to E! News to celebrate iconic designer Bob Mackie at the premiere red carpet for the new documentary 'Bob Mackie: Naked Illusion.' For even more, tune in to E! News Mon - Thurs at 11 PM on E!

Amber Rose Says Ex Machine Gun Kelly Regretted Not Treating Her Better

In a new interview, Amber Rose shares why Machine Gun Kelly apologized to her after they broke up in 2015.

Cher and Boyfriend Alexander Edwards Enjoy Date Night at Pre-Grammys Party After Rekindling Romance

Cher and boyfriend Alexander "A.E." Edwards were seen having a night out at a 2024 Grammys pre-party in Los Angeles just months after confirming that the two had gotten back together.

Cher DENIED Conservatorship of Son Elijah Due to "Insufficient Evidence"

A court has denied Cher's request to become sole conservator of her son Elijah's estate despite claims he is "unable to manage his financial resources."

Cher Denied Conservatorship of Son Elijah Blue Allman

Cher sought to become sole conservator of her son Elijah Blue Allman's estate, claiming he is "substantially unable to manage his financial resources," but a court denied her request.

Cher Files Conservatorship for Son Elijah Blue Allman

Cher is seeking to be the sole conservator of her son Elijah Blue Allman's estate, claiming he is "substantially unable to manage his financial resources."

Cher Files for Conservatorship of Son Elijah Blue Allman

Cher is seeking to be the sole conservator of her 47-year-old son Elijah Blue Allman's estate, claiming he is "substantially unable to manage his financial resources."

How Cher REALLY Feels About Kelly Clarkson’s Cover of Her Song

Cher shares her thoughts on Kelly Clarkson’s "Kellyoke" performance of her "DJ Play A Christmas Song" on the latest episode of 'The Kelly Clarkson Show.'

Cher Says Getting Older "Pisses the F--k Out of Me"

In a new interview with 'Today,' legendary singer Cher shares insight into how she feels about getting older, noting, "I'd give anything to be 70 again!"

Cher Reveals Her Honest Thoughts About Aging

Cher recently shared insight into how she feels about getting older, noting, "I'd give anything to be 70 again!"

Cher Accused of Hiring 4 Men to Kidnap Her Son Elijah Blue Allman

The estranged wife of Cher's youngest son Elijah Blue Allman alleges in court filings that the singer hired men to remove him from a hotel room they shared.

Cher Celebrates 77th Birthday and Questions When She Will "Feel Old"

Cher turned 77 on May 20 and got philosophical about aging. Read her comments and look back at her most iconic fashion styles over the years.

Cher and Boyfriend Alexander Edwards Break Up

Cher and Alexander "A.E." Edwards have called it quits after several months of dating, E! News confirmed. Inside the former couple's breakup.

Kelly Clarkson Reveals Why She Missed Interviewing Cher in Person

Kelly Clarkson was forced to Zoom into her epic December 2022 Kelly Clarkson Show interview with icon Cher, and she's never revealed why—until now. Find out why she couldn't be there in person.

You Better Believe Cher and Boyfriend Alexander Edwards Are Detailing Their Date Nights

Find out what Cher and boyfriend Alexander Edwards told E! News about their dating life as they made a steamy red carpet debut as a couple.

Lil Nas X's "Cute Slut Moment" Is Such a Vibe

In an exclusive interview with E! News, Lil Nas X shared how he was having a "cute slut moment" in head-to-toe Versace at the Italian luxury label's fashion show in L.A. on March 9. See his look.

Cher Reveals She's Working on New Music With Boyfriend Alexander Edwards

Cher and boyfriend Alexander "A.E." Edwards are getting serious—in the studio. See the icon's big news about making new music with the producer.

Cher and Boyfriend Alexander Edwards Have Date Night at Pre-Grammys Party

Cher and boyfriend Alexander "A.E." Edwards were seen walking hand-in-hand while leaving a 2023 Grammys pre-party in Beverly Hills. Learn about the couple’s Feb. 3 date night.
